body:
In the MSI, hpack.a has a timestamp of 2016-01-14 00:25:12. hpack.go has a timestamp of 2016-01-14 00:24:08. These timestamps appear to be preserved by the installer (although the output of "dir" truncates the seconds, so I'm not absolutely sure about seconds).

Hmm. That's over a minute. So it's probably something else. Sorry for the red herring.
